About me

Hello there! I'm Nomudev, a full-stack developer fueled by passion and drive.

Proficient in backend tech like Java, Springboot, and Python (Flask), I'm currently delving into Rust while mastering frontend tools like React, Astro, and Node.js.

Currently pursuing a degree in Multiplatform Application Development.

I've honed my skills through various projects. With a background in managing teams and driving sales strategies in the hospitality industry.

I bring a unique blend of technical expertise and business acumen to every project.

Let's collaborate and transform your ideas into reality!
